In today's digital landscape, individuals commonly maintain multiple social media accounts across different platforms, each serving distinct purposes. For instance, professionals might use LinkedIn for career networking while sharing personal moments on Instagram. The ability to identify and link these accounts across platforms enables a comprehensive understanding of user behavior, which has valuable implications for user profile modeling and cross-platform recommendations [19]. However, these connections between accounts—known as anchor links—are typically not readily available due to the autonomous nature of different social networks, making user identity linkage an increasingly significant research focus.

Social network user data generally encompasses three main components: network structure (social connections), profile information (such as screen names and location), and content (such as posts). Each component reveals different aspects of user identity. While some research approaches [11, 25, 17, 15, 12, 31] focus on single-type information analysis, this method often proves inadequate due to data noise, incompleteness, and cross-platform inconsistencies [19]. Other studies [6, 26, 13, 29, 20, 27] explore methods to combine multiple information types, recognizing their complementary nature.

Current information fusion approaches can be categorized into two methodologies: embedding-based [20, 27, 22, 23] and non-embedding-based methods [6, 26, 13, 29]. Non-embedding approaches typically develop hand-crafted features for each information type independently, combining them through supervised or semi-supervised learning [6, 13]. However, this approach fails to capture deep semantic relationships and rich interactions among different information types. In contrast, embedding-based methods [18, 3] aim to create low-dimensional vector representations that preserve original data characteristics, offering reduced computational and storage costs while enabling seamless integration with deep learning models.

However, embedding-based methods face two significant challenges. First, they lack a comprehensive solution for integrating all three information types—structure, profile, and content. While network structure embedding is well-researched [15, 12, 2], and some studies explore combined embedding of structure with either profile [20, 27] or content [22], these approaches rely on specific interaction mechanisms that don't scale well to multiple information types. Second, few studies explicitly model neighborhood impact—the influence of a user's first-order connections.

Le Destin Tragique d'une Mannequin : Une Histoire Bouleversante

La vie d'une jeune mannequin a basculé tragiquement après avoir consommé un simple pretzel au beurre d'arachides. Le vendredi dernier, la famille de Chantel Giacalone a obtenu gain de cause dans le procès intenté en 2013 contre MedicWest Ambulance, se voyant accorder une compensation de 29,5 millions de dollars américains (environ 37 millions de dollars canadiens), selon le Las Vegas Review-Journal.

L'incident s'est produit le 20 février 2013 au Mandalay Bay South Convention Center de Las Vegas, où Chantel participait à un défilé de mode. Tout a commencé lorsqu'une amie lui a rapporté un yogourt glacé accompagné d'un pretzel miniature. Suite à l'ingestion du pretzel, Chantel a subi un violent choc anaphylactique.

Les plaignants ont démontré la négligence des services ambulanciers dans la prise en charge de la jeune femme. Selon son avocat, Me Christian Morris, Chantel, qui débutait également une carrière d'actrice, a été privée d'oxygène au cerveau pendant plusieurs minutes avant l'intervention de MedicWest Ambulance. Un élément crucial est ressorti durant le procès : aucun des deux ambulanciers présents ne disposait d'éphédrine intraveineuse, le traitement standard requis par la santé publique du Nevada du Sud pour les réactions allergiques sévères. Ils n'avaient que de l'éphédrine intramusculaire, qui s'est révélée insuffisante pour contrer la réaction allergique.

"Chaque minute de la vie de Chantel a été altérée de façon irréversible. Chaque minute depuis son entrée à l'infirmerie, aux mains d'une entreprise qui privilégie les profits au bien-être de ses patients", a plaidé Me Morris. Bien que MedicWest ait contesté ces accusations, maintenant que l'extrême sensibilité de la jeune femme aux arachides rendait le résultat inévitable, le jury a tranché en faveur de la famille.

Aujourd'hui, à 35 ans, Chantel Giacalone est quadriplégique et ne peut communiquer qu'en bougeant les yeux. Elle nécessite des soins constants, fournis par ses parents 24 heures sur 24. L'indemnisation accordée permettra à la famille d'acquérir une nouvelle résidence adaptée aux besoins spécifiques de Chantel.

# Detecting Incipient Anomalies: An Ensemble Learning Approach

## 1. Introduction

In anomaly detection applications, it is common to encounter anomaly data examples whose symptoms correspond to different Severity Levels (SLs). As shown in Fig. 1a, faults can be categorized into four different SLs, from SL1 (slightest) to SL4 (most severe). The ability to accurately assess fault severity is crucial yet challenging, particularly for low-severity examples, as SL1 data clusters tend to be much closer to the normal cluster than to their corresponding SL4 clusters.

This presents a fundamental challenge: anomaly detection systems must be sensitive enough to identify low-severity faults while maintaining a low false-positive rate. When labeled data from different SLs are available, traditional regression or classification approaches can be applied. However, these fine-grained labeled datasets are often difficult to prepare, and we may not always have access to a full spectrum of anomaly SLs.

## 2. Problem Statement

Consider an extreme case, as illustrated in Fig. 1b, where only the two ends of the severity spectrum are available (normal condition SL0 and most severe anomaly condition SL4), with incipient anomaly instances unavailable. A classifier trained only on SL0 and SL4 data may perform well on in-distribution data but fail to identify incipient anomaly data, with most SL1 faults potentially being misclassified as normal.

Classical supervised learning approaches designed for maximal separation between labeled classes (e.g., margin-based classifiers, discriminative neural networks) are less effective in detecting such low-severity, incipient anomaly examples. In the absence of labeled data for certain fault categories, common practices involve developing generative models (Gaussian mixture model, PCA, LSTM network, autoencoder). However, these models may not generalize well, potentially classifying unseen incipient anomaly instances as normal.

## 3. Proposed Solution

Our solution leverages ensemble learning, training multiple classifiers to recognize incipient anomalies through their joint decisions. While existing ensemble methods focus on decision uncertainty estimation, we observe that this approach becomes less effective for SL1 data close to the normal cluster. We propose:

1. Increasing statistical power of base learners by moving decision boundaries toward the normal cluster
2. Developing proper methods to combine anomaly scores from ensemble members

## 4. Contributions

Our key contributions include:

- Experimental demonstration of risks posed by incipient anomaly examples to popular supervised ML-based anomaly detection models
- Comparative analysis of uncertainty metrics (mean vs. variance) for ensemble learning
- Practical recommendations for developing effective ensemble models

## 5. Paper Structure

The remainder of this paper is organized as follows:
- Section 2: Problem formulation and background
- Section 3: Detailed methodology
- Section 4: Dataset descriptions
- Section 5: Experimental results
- Section 6: Literature review

It was much easier than Joe had originally thought. He reflected on how he had simply offered the woman a drink, laced with Rohypnol, of course, and then moved her limp, unconscious body into his truck. He was driving to his private residence, deep in the sparsely populated backwoods of his town, where no one would disturb him.

In a way, Joe didn't want to do this, but he couldn't stop fantasizing about the time he would spend with his new guest. In his lonely isolation, Joe had lost touch with the world. He could never seem to socialize properly to get women to like him. With his increasing age and worsening appearance, Joe felt he could not afford to wait any longer. He had convinced himself that if they could just spend a little more time with him, one might eventually fall in love with him. So he devised a plan: he would kidnap women he liked and force them to stay with him. If they wanted out, if they couldn't eventually like him back, well, he obviously couldn't let them go to the police... could he? In any case, Joe hoped it wouldn't come to that. The lonely truck turned onto the dirt path that would eventually lead to his home, unaware that it was not as empty as he thought.

Joe entered his residence. It was thoroughly cleaned in preparation for his "guest." He had to make a good first impression, after all. He laid the woman—no, his female acquaintance—on the couch and went to work tying her hands and feet. Joe wouldn't take the chance of his guest running away before he could properly introduce himself.

"Hey Joe," a voice said in a calm and even tone, startling Joe nevertheless. Turning around, he saw an old but fit, bearded man sitting at his kitchen table. Frozen in shock, he just stared at the old man. Someone caught me? Already!? But I was careful! Do I kill him? Who else knows? Am I going to prison? Those were the thoughts that fired around in his brain. His body screamed for action, but his mind didn't know what to do.

"Listen to me very carefully," the old man said, again in a steady tone. Without an idea of what to do, Joe did just what the man said. "I am you, from the future." The old man had a stern look in his eye. "And what you are doing will never work." The old man began telling Joe, in detail, all the things he did and would do. Joe had told no one of his desires, yet this old man knew every part of it.

Upon hearing what the old man had to say, Joe realized that the old man was telling the truth. He saw himself, older yes, but strikingly similar in appearance. Joe couldn't say anything; he was dumbfounded. Stressed by the abnormality of the situation, Joe broke down.

"What am I supposed to do?" Joe whimpered, tears rolling down his face. He was caught, and by his future self no less. The old man stood up and made his way toward his sobbing younger self. With an empathetic pat on the shoulder, the old man handed Joe a card.

"This was the place I went to when I realized what I'd been doing. They're probably just starting out now, but they really helped me see the wrong I had been doing." The old man had a solemn look on his face now. "It was too late for the people I had hurt, but you still have a chance to make things right."

"What about her?" Joe asked, motioning to the woman on his couch.

"I'll take her back.

# La Bibliothèque de Sankara : Portrait d'un Révolutionnaire

## Introduction
J'ai enfin compris pourquoi Sankara ne me touchait qu'à moitié. L'homme est admirable. Il a transformé un pays, redonné de l'espoir à un peuple, rebaptisé sa patrie, combattu l'ennemi, dénoncé l'impérialisme, tenté de voler l'avion d'un pays ami, travaillé à la souveraineté de ses frères. Et tout cela n'est encore qu'une infime part de sa geste, d'autant plus superbe qu'elle a eu une fin prématurée et tragique.

## L'Homme et le Mythe
C'est un homme devenu un mythe, un saint, un des nombreux prophètes du siècle passé. Il a même des zones d'ombre. On s'incline bien bas. Pourtant… Mais avant de continuer, un aveu : imbécile ou naïve habitude, je ne juge les hommes et femmes d'État qu'à leurs lectures, à leur bibliothèque. Là est leur dernière vérité (politique).

## Son Rapport aux Livres
Sankara lit, bien entendu. Qu'y a-t-il dans sa bibliothèque ? Rien, puisqu'il dit, dans un très révélateur entretien publié dans ce journal même [numéro du 12 mars 1986], ne pas en posséder. En réalité, l'homme a un rapport problématique à la confession de ses lectures : « Une bibliothèque, c'est dangereux, ça trahit. » Il ne lit presque jamais de fiction, ça l'emmerde. Les romans africains l'insupportent. Il tance Ki-Zerbo, égratigne Cheikh Hamidou Kane, confirme qu'il écrit lui-même ses discours – ouf !

## Ses Lectures de Prédilection
Mais que lit le grand homme ? Il lâche qu'il n'a pas fini Le Capital, mais qu'il a lu tout Lénine. Entre camarades prophètes… L'État et la Révolution est son « livre refuge ». Il l'emporterait sur une île déserte avec… la Bible et le Coran.

# The Face on Mars: A Scientific Perspective

As a NASA representative, I'd like to address the much-discussed landform on Mars that resembles a face. Despite widespread speculation, current evidence suggests this is a natural formation rather than an artificial structure.

The formation bears striking similarities to natural landmarks found on Earth, particularly in Idaho. For nearly two decades, NASA scientists have conducted extensive studies of this Martian feature, finding no evidence of artificial origin.

When first photographed, the formation captured public imagination due to its face-like appearance. However, subsequent imaging with advanced technology has revealed significant differences from the original 1998 photographs. These changes can be attributed to natural processes:

- Solar wind erosion
- Dust accumulation and dispersal
- Natural weathering of Martian materials and minerals

The 1998 images, which some interpreted as resembling an Egyptian pharaoh, demonstrate how technological limitations of the era affected our perception. Modern high-resolution imaging shows a markedly different formation, highlighting how the feature changes over time through natural processes.

While some researchers haven't completely dismissed the possibility of extraterrestrial origins, it's important to note that:
- No evidence of artificial construction exists
- No signs of ancient life have been found in the vicinity
- The formation's appearance continues to evolve through natural processes

NASA continues to study this landmark thoroughly, collecting and analyzing data to better understand its composition and formation. Until compelling evidence suggests otherwise, we classify this as a natural geological formation shaped by Martian environmental conditions.

Our investigation remains ongoing, and we will continue to share findings as they emerge through our research efforts.

*This concludes our official statement on the Mars face formation.*

Technology advances at a remarkable pace, with new software and devices emerging regularly. While opinions vary on the long-term benefits of these innovations, I believe the Facial Action Coding System (FACS) holds tremendous potential, particularly in educational and professional settings.

One significant advantage of FACS is its ability to enhance classroom learning. Students often struggle with maintaining focus during lessons, a challenge that this system directly addresses. As author Nick D'Alto notes, "A classroom computer could recognize when a student is becoming confused or bored." This real-time emotional detection capability could revolutionize how teachers engage with their students, ensuring more effective and dynamic learning experiences.

The universal applicability of FACS further demonstrates its value in education. As D'Alto explains, "the facial expressions for each emotion are universal." This characteristic makes the system globally relevant, potentially improving educational experiences for students worldwide. Rather than passively staring at screens, students can engage in personalized learning experiences tailored to their emotional responses and comprehension levels.

While FACS offers compelling benefits, its implementation does face one notable challenge: cost. The sophisticated technology and development behind the system likely results in a significant price tag, potentially limiting access for some educational institutions. However, this barrier may diminish over time as the technology becomes more widespread and accessible. Schools that can currently afford the system would likely find it a worthwhile investment in their students' success.

Despite this single drawback, FACS represents a remarkable advancement in educational technology. Its potential to transform the learning experience by eliminating confusion and disengagement makes it a promising tool for modern education.

Millonarios visitará este jueves al boliviano Always Ready en el partido de vuelta de la primera fase de la Copa Sudamericana 2020, respaldado por el triunfo 2-0 logrado en la ida en Bogotá.

El encuentro de revancha se disputará en el estadio Siles de La Paz, ubicado a 3.600 metros sobre el nivel del mar.

Con una discretísima campaña en el actual torneo colombiano, Millonarios tiene la mejor opción de avanzar frente a un Always Ready que viene enrachado en el segundo lugar del torneo doméstico boliviano Apertura 2020, a solo un punto del líder Royal Pari.

Las cuentas son claras: el cuadro boliviano necesita anotar al menos tres goles y mantener su arco en cero para avanzar a la segunda ronda, mientras que al 'embajador' le basta empatar o caer por menos de tres tantos. Una derrota 2-0 conduciría a la definición por penales.

Si bien equipos argentinos, uruguayos y brasileños han logrado dominar los 3.600 metros de altitud de La Paz consiguiendo victorias, los medios colombianos ya comenzaron a mencionar la altura como un rival adicional por vencer.

Por disposición de la Conmebol, Millonarios, que también juega en altitud (2.630 metros en Bogotá), se libró de tener que ascender al reducto del Always Ready en el estadio de Villa Ingenio de El Alto, situado a 4.090 metros de altura, debido a que ese coliseo carece de iluminación adecuada.

Para este compromiso, el técnico Alberto Gamero convocó a 19 jugadores. Si bien deberá prescindir de Luciano Ospina por lesión, contará con sus habituales centrales Breiner Paz y Juan Pablo Vargas, además del retorno del volante Juan Carlos Pereira y del delantero Eliser Quiñones.

El partido se disputará este jueves bajo la dirección del árbitro ecuatoriano Franklyn Congo, asistido por sus compatriotas Byron Romero y Christian Lescano.

Here's the polished version of the text, maintaining its academic tone while improving clarity and flow:

Computer vision has advanced rapidly through deep learning techniques, with increasingly sophisticated models emerging for object detection, image classification, segmentation, pose estimation, and tracking [31, 49, 42]. Despite this progress, significant challenges remain—notably, domain shift. While Convolutional Neural Networks (CNNs) dominate computer vision, their performance often deteriorates when processing unseen data or data from different domains, a phenomenon known as domain shift. Since deep learning models are data-driven and achieve high accuracy through vast, diverse datasets, domain shift becomes particularly problematic when labeled data for specific scenarios is scarce.

Consider, for example, car detection systems: a model trained on daytime imagery may perform poorly in nighttime conditions. While the solution might seem straightforward—training with nighttime data—the reality is that datasets for specific scenarios are often limited or unlabeled, complicating efforts to mitigate domain shift effects.

To address scenarios where training data is scarce or unavailable, image-to-image translation offers a promising solution. The emergence of Generative Adversarial Networks (GANs) [15] has enabled researchers to generate synthetic datasets for specific scenarios. Notably, unpaired image-to-image translation models like CycleGAN [52] can convert images bidirectionally between source and target domains without requiring paired images, making them particularly valuable for real-world applications.

These GAN models can generate synthetic target domain images from source domain originals in the training dataset. These GAN-generated images can then train object detection models for testing on target domain images [2]. In addressing cross-domain object detection, the process involves pre-processing data, generating synthetic images through translation models, and training detection models with the generated data. This approach has demonstrated improved detection performance in scenarios where training and testing data come from different domains [2].

We propose a novel perspective that goes beyond simply using synthetic images for training. Our approach concatenates original images with their GAN-translated counterparts to create new 6-channel representations. When working with source domain images intended for testing on unlabeled target domain images, we first train an image-to-image translation model using both source and target domain data. The trained model then generates corresponding synthetic images.

# نتنياهو يهاجم لقاء أولمرت وعباس في نيويورك

**بقلم: زين خليل | الخليج 365**

وصف رئيس الوزراء الإسرائيلي المنتهية ولايته، بنيامين نتنياهو، اللقاء الذي جمع سلفه إيهود أولمرت مع الرئيس الفلسطيني محمود عباس في نيويورك بأنه "نقطة انحطاط في تاريخ إسرائيل"، في حين وصف تحالف يميني متشدد أولمرت بأنه "مجرم".

وقد عقد أولمرت وعباس، يوم الثلاثاء، مؤتمراً صحفياً مشتركاً في نيويورك على خلفية ما يُعرف بـ"صفقة القرن" الأمريكية، حيث دعا الطرفان إلى استئناف مفاوضات السلام الإسرائيلية-الفلسطينية كسبيل لتحقيق السلام.

وفي لقاء مباشر مع القناة "20" الإسرائيلية التابعة لليمين الصهيوني مساء الثلاثاء، قال نتنياهو إن لقاء أولمرت-عباس يمثل "نقطة انحطاط في تاريخ إسرائيل"، واصفاً إياه بـ"العار والخزي".

وحاول نتنياهو استثمار اللقاء سياسياً بتجديد ادعاءاته بأن أولمرت، الذي شغل منصب رئيس الوزراء (2006-2009)، يعمل مستشاراً لمنافسه بيني غانتس، زعيم تحالف "أزرق-أبيض". وهو ما نفاه أولمرت سابقاً، مؤكداً عدم انتمائه لأي حزب سياسي.

The Islamic Centre of Yellowknife (ICYK) is demonstrating that the season of giving transcends religious boundaries, as it distributes hundreds of winter clothing and hygiene items to communities and organizations across the NWT.

The winter warmth kits, which Islamic Relief Canada shipped from Edmonton, include toques, mitts, scarves, thermal socks, blankets, and cloth masks, according to ICYK chair Nazim Awan. Complementing these items are hygiene packs containing essential supplies such as chapstick, toothpaste, toothbrushes, sanitary wipes, hair combs, and gender-specific deodorants.

The initiative, which began in 2019, has garnered community support. Charles Corothers of Corother's Home Hardware sponsored the shipping from Edmonton when ICYK members received the materials last Friday. "We arranged to bring everything up for them," Corothers said. "They did all the work. They organized this program for the community. It involved a lot of volunteer work up here. I hope this helped them out. It's fantastic what they're doing. It's quite a program they put together. Just by being a small cog in the wheel is a good feeling."

The distribution plan ensures widespread reach across the territory. The Native Women's Association of the NWT will receive more than 50 kits, while 100 will go to the YWCA. Twenty-five kits were already sent to Ulukhaktok through the RCMP toy drive last week, with the remaining kits destined for organizations in Dettah, Ndilo, and Behchoko. Additionally, the ICYK will handle direct deliveries to individuals in need.

# Macy's Révise ses Objectifs Annuels à la Hausse

Tous droits de reproduction et de représentation réservés © Copyright 2018 AOF. Avertissement légal.

Macy's relève une nouvelle fois ses objectifs annuels, comme elle l'avait déjà fait lors de la publication de ses résultats du premier trimestre mi-mai. Le distributeur américain prévoit désormais un bénéfice par action ajusté compris entre 3,95 et 4,15 dollars pour cette année, avec des ventes qui devraient être, au pire, stables, et au mieux, en croissance de 0,7%. En données comparables, les ventes devraient s'apprécier de 2,1 à 2,5%. Pour le second semestre uniquement, une progression de 2 à 2,5% est attendue en données comparables.

Mi-mai, Macy's avait déjà augmenté de 20 cents sa fourchette de bénéfice par action ajusté anticipé pour l'année, la portant à 3,75-3,95 dollars. Les prévisions de ventes annuelles oscillaient alors entre une baisse de 1% et une hausse de 0,5%. En données comparables, la croissance était estimée entre 1 et 2%.

Initialement, l'entreprise prévoyait des ventes stables ou en croissance de 1% en comparable, avec des ventes totales attendues en progression de 0,5 à 2%.

Pour le deuxième trimestre, clos début août, Macy's a enregistré :
- Un bénéfice net de 166 millions de dollars (contre 111 millions un an plus tôt)

# تداعيات منح جائزة أوبرا درسدن للرئيس المصري

## الحدث الرئيسي والاستقالة
قالت الإعلامية الألمانية ماريلي هوبنر في مقابلة صحفية مع قناة إذاعة وتلفزيون وسط ألمانيا في درسدن إن السبب في رفضها تقديم احتفالية أوبرا درسدن "زمبر أوبر" يرجع "إلى تصاعد درجة الكراهية التي وصلت إلى حد التهديدات" داخل القناة التلفزيونية التابعة لمؤسسة الأوبرا. وأضافت قائلة: "أصبحت الآن ضحية وهدفا لأشد أنواع الكراهية والعداء".

## خلفية الأزمة
كانت يوديث راكرز قد سحبت موافقتها على تقديم الحفل بعد منح جائزة أوبرا درسدن - وسام القديس جورج للسلام - للرئيس المصري عبد الفتاح السيسي مساء الأربعاء الماضي. وفي يوم الخميس، تم اختيار ماريلي هوبنر لهذا الدور إلى جانب مغني البوب رولاند كايزر، الذي انتقد منح الجائزة للرئيس المصري بشدة، لكنه أكد مشاركته في الحفل المقرر في السابع من شباط/فبراير.

## موقف القناة والدعم القانوني
أعلنت القناة أنها "لن تدع بعض الأصوات الراديكالية بالشبكة تؤثر على عملها"، مؤكدة أنها ستبث الاحتفالية رغم الجدل. كما أعلنت القناة مساندتها القانونية لهوبنر في مواجهة الكراهية والتحريض داخل الشبكة إذا تطور الأمر قضائياً.

## ردود الفعل والتضامن
عبر هانز يوآخيم فراي، رئيس اتحاد دار أوبرا درسدن، عن صدمته من التحريض والكراهية التي تعرضت لها هوبنر، مؤكداً أن هذا العداء "يبقى خارج نطاق كل قدرة على التصور". وعلقت القناة بقولها: "نحن في قناة إذاعة وتلفزيون وسط ألمانيا مصابون بصدمة بشأن حجم الوحشية في المعاملة".

## تطلعات مستقبلية
أعربت هوبنر عن أملها في أن تتمسك مؤسسة أوبرا درسدن "بخدمة القيم الديمقراطية العالية" بعد هذه الأحداث، متمنية لزميلها رولاند كايزر القوة لإحياء الأمسية، وداعية المسؤولين عن الحفل للبدء من جديد.

# Crise chez GM Korea : Échec des négociations sur fond de restructuration

## La situation actuelle
GM Korea et les syndicats n'ont pas réussi à conclure un accord pour éviter le dépôt de bilan, malgré l'ultimatum posé. Selon une source syndicale citée par Reuters, les négociations devraient reprendre demain et se poursuivre jusqu'à lundi. Dan Amman, président de General Motors (GM), avait pourtant souligné l'urgence de parvenir à un accord sur une restructuration financière à long terme des activités en Corée du Sud.

## Contexte de la restructuration
Depuis février dernier, GM Korea, qui fait face à des pertes financières, a entamé un processus de restructuration. Le constructeur automobile cherche à obtenir des concessions tant de la part des salariés que du gouvernement sud-coréen. Dans ce cadre, GM avait déjà annoncé le 13 février la fermeture de son site de Gunsan d'ici fin mai 2018. Comme l'avait alors déclaré Kaher Kazem, responsable de GM en Corée : "C'est un premier pas nécessaire mais difficile dans la restructuration de nos activités en Corée du Sud".

## Perspective plus large : Le secteur automobile européen
Dans un contexte plus global, le marché automobile européen montre des signes encourageants :
- L'ACEA (Association des constructeurs européens d'automobiles) prévoit une croissance de 1,5% à 2% cette année, révisant à la hausse sa précédente estimation de 1%
- Cette progression reste toutefois modeste comparée à la croissance de 6,8% enregistrée en 2016, qui avait permis d'atteindre près de 14,6 millions d'unités, un record sur neuf ans

### Défis du secteur
Le secteur automobile fait face à plusieurs défis majeurs :
- Les répercussions continues du scandale Volkswagen sur les moteurs Diesel truqués, qui affecte désormais la majorité des constructeurs européens

باريس - (د ب أ)

طالب مؤيدو المرشح الرئاسي المحافظ فرانسوا فيون المدعين العامين الفرنسيين، اليوم الاثنين، بفتح تحقيق في مزاعم وردت في كتاب حديث النشر. تتعلق هذه المزاعم باستخدام الشرطة والإجراءات القضائية لاستهداف منافسي الرئيس الاشتراكي فرانسوا أولاند.

وقد وجّه برونو ريتايليو، منسق حملة فيون، برفقة أربعة مشرعين آخرين، رسالة إلى المدعين العامين يطالبونهم فيها بـ"اتخاذ الإجراءات المناسبة" حيال الادعاءات الواردة في كتاب "بينفين بلاس بيوفاو" الذي ألّفه ثلاثة صحفيين.

وصرّح ريتايليو لشبكة "بي إف إم تي" أن المحامين العاملين لصالح النواب، وبعد دراستهم لادعاءات الصحفيين، رصدوا 12 انتهاكاً محتملاً للقانون. وأضاف أنه من الضروري التحقق مما إذا كانت هذه الادعاءات "تستند إلى وقائع حقيقية أم أنها مجرد أكاذيب".

واستند فيون الأسبوع الماضي إلى هذا الكتاب لتعزيز اتهامه لأولاند بالمسؤولية عن تسريب معلومات تتعلق بالتحقيق الجاري في قضية التوظيف الوهمي لزوجته. وقد قوبل هذا الاتهام برد غاضب من الرئيس أولاند، الذي أكد أنه علم لأول مرة بـ"القضايا الخطيرة المتعلقة بالسيد فيون" من وسائل الإعلام.

Here's a restructured and improved version of the text about driverless cars:

# The Promise and Perils of Driverless Cars

Driverless cars have long captured our imagination through television and media, evolving from science fiction to an approaching reality. As Sebastian, the founder of the Google Car project, suggests, autonomous vehicles may soon become commonplace. However, several critical concerns surround their implementation: safety, cost, and legal implications.

## Safety Concerns
The primary concern with autonomous vehicles is safety. Current "driverless" technology still requires human oversight, as noted in industry reports: "The human driver must remain alert and be ready to take over when the situation requires." This raises questions about the technology's reliability and its ability to prevent accidents without human intervention. The promise of fully autonomous vehicles that require no human attention remains uncertain.

## Economic Barriers
The technological sophistication required for truly autonomous vehicles presents significant economic challenges. As industry research indicates, "they needed a whole lot of sensors" just for current semi-autonomous capabilities. This extensive technological investment suggests that future fully autonomous vehicles may be prohibitively expensive for many interested consumers.

## Legal Complexities
The legal framework surrounding driverless cars presents another significant challenge. A crucial question remains unanswered: "If the technology fails and someone is injured, who is at fault—the driver or the manufacturer?" This uncertainty has led to the need for updated laws "to cover the liability in the case of an accident." Currently, many states remain cautious, restricting the testing of autonomous vehicles due to safety concerns.

## Conclusion
While driverless cars represent an exciting technological advancement, significant questions persist regarding their safety, accessibility, and legal implications.

投球握法示意图（美联社）

在棒球界，"Pitching Ninja"这个名号广为人知，但创建者罗伯·傅利曼（Rob Friedman）却鲜为人知。他以制作大联盟投手投球轨迹的动态图像而闻名，这些精确展现球路变化的动图在网络上广受欢迎。

凭借个人对棒球的热忱，傅利曼每天在推特上分享投手精彩表现的动态影像。他的"Pitching Ninja"账号吸引了数万粉丝。然而，由于未获得MLB官方授权，其账号一度被封禁。这引发球迷强烈反响，甚至有职业球员出面请愿解禁。

太空人投手兰斯·麦卡勒（Lance McCullers）就在推特上呼吁MLB和推特平台恢复"Pitching Ninja"的账号。他强调："这些内容不仅帮助年轻球员更好地理解投球技巧，MLB的选手们也都很欣赏这些作品。"

虽然傅利曼的账号在四月曾被暂时关闭，但很快就获得解封。据报道，他随后与MLB达成合作协议，将个人兴趣转化为职业工作。

作为一位热爱棒球的教练，傅利曼不仅指导自己的孩子，还担任学校的义务投手教练。他制作动图的初衷是为球迷和业余选手提供学习范本，通过详细解析投手的出手动作、握法和各种球路轨迹。

在接受《The Athletic》采访时，傅利曼表示："起初我和其他人一样，找看似专业的教练教导孩子投球。但我发现他们的教学方法与成功投手的实际技巧存在差异。"

如今，"Pitching Ninja"的推特账号经常展示令人惊叹的滑球和速球表现。许多职业球员会主动联系傅利曼，请求他制作动图用于研究自身投球技巧，打者也时常提出类似需求。

从四月被封时的5.7万粉丝，到现在的7.8万追随者，只要有比赛，傅利曼都会持续为球迷提供精彩的动态解析。

The Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) serves as the secure element in mobile devices, containing essential identifiers and cryptographic credentials that authenticate mobile subscribers to their network operators (MNOs). Traditionally implemented as a removable smart card, the SIM has allowed users to switch between different mobile subscribers and networks simply by changing cards. Modern devices, however, are increasingly adopting the embedded SIM (eSIM)—a secure element integrated directly into the device's circuit board that can be programmed with multiple SIM profiles.

Remote SIM Provisioning (RSP) [32], as specified by the GSM Association (GSMA), enables the downloading and installation of SIM profiles into this secure element. This protocol reduces logistical and production costs while offering subscribers the flexibility to change operators online [56]. RSP comes in two variants: the machine-to-machine (M2M) version [33, 34] for remotely controllable devices, and the consumer version [35, 36] for smartphones, tablets, and wearables. The key distinction between these variants lies in user interaction requirements—M2M operates autonomously, while the consumer version requires user initiation for profile management operations.

Each SIM profile contains critical security information, including the International Mobile Subscriber Identity (IMSI) and subscriber key 𝐾𝑖, which the user equipment (UE) shares with the MNO. These credentials are essential for the Authentication and Key Agreement (AKA) procedure that grants network access [2], making secure profile delivery paramount.

Security breaches involving SIM profiles can lead to severe consequences, including identity theft, billing fraud, eavesdropping, and privacy violations. Past incidents highlight these risks: attackers have successfully captured profile credentials by infiltrating SIM manufacturer networks [51] and executed memory-exhaustion attacks against secure elements through M2M RSP protocol vulnerabilities [45].

This paper presents a comprehensive security analysis of the consumer RSP protocol, employing formal protocol modeling and requirements verification through applied pi calculus and the ProVerif tool [16]. Our key contributions include:

1. Development of the first formal model of the consumer RSP protocol, based on core message flows and content from the specification [35, 36].

2. Identification and formalization of explicit and implicit security requirements, including analysis under partial compromise scenarios.

3. Detailed verification results revealing unexpected security vulnerabilities under partial compromise conditions, with clear explanations of attack vectors and root causes.

4. Practical recommendations for specification enhancement and implementation guidance, verified through formal modeling.

The paper is structured as follows: Section 2 covers foundational concepts in protocol modeling, ProVerif, and SIM provisioning security.

In [3], the authors pioneer a novel mathematical approach to neural coding in neuroscience. They discretize receptive fields and model them as binary codes C ⊆ {0, 1}n, where each coordinate in an n-dimensional vector represents a neuron. In this model, a coordinate value of 1 indicates the neuron is "on," while 0 indicates it is "off."

When studying discretized receptive field codes, researchers observe that neurons are more likely to fail to activate (when they should be "on") than to activate erroneously (when they should be "off"). This behavioral pattern aligns with the binary asymmetric channel model, where a 0 transforms to 1 with probability p, and 1 becomes 0 with probability q ≥ p. This model is actually a family of channels that includes both the binary symmetric channel (when p = q) and the Z-channel (when p = 0).

Recent years have seen significant advances in understanding the mathematical properties of the binary asymmetric channel and its associated binary codes. A key breakthrough came in 2016 when researchers proved that the binary asymmetric channel is metrizable in Massey's weak sense [8, 9]. Subsequently, Qureshi confirmed a conjecture by Firer and Walker [6] by demonstrating that the binary asymmetric channel admits a matched metric [10]. Qureshi's work developed criteria and algorithms to determine when a discrete memoryless channel supports a metric where maximum likelihood decoding matches nearest neighbor decoding.

# The True Nature of Eternity

I was eternity. Forever. I was there alongside him, when he created the heavens and the earth. I witnessed his creation.

Alpha and Omega. Beginning and the end.

I was sickened by their blind loyalty, their endless praise. So I did what was in my nature. I accused. I taught these fleas how to think for themselves. I bared for all to see, his selfish, arrogant methods, and they couldn't deny it. I subverted them, gave them thought, and many of them saw him for the fraud he was.

So when these fleas died, he sent them to me, disgusted by their questioning ways. And again, I indulged in my nature. I took delight in accusing every single one of them, laying out their folly. It amused me, to observe them. Their constant pondering about their origin, and their destination, was of particular interest. I had given them free thought, the ability to be as critical as I, and I enjoyed seeing the fleas trying to utilize it in their own limited capacity.

Or maybe not as limited as I thought, for it never occurred to me to wonder about my own origin, or my own destination. I had called him out, questioned him, subverted him. But I never doubted him on one thing: He always was, and always will be. And I, right alongside him. For all my questioning and arguing, I never thought we could be tied by the same limitations as the fleas he had created.

But here I was, being held by a being I couldn't comprehend, with a power I could not fathom. It read out a list of my sins, laid out my flaws and imperfections for me to see, the same way I had accused the fleas of HIS creation.

# أسوان تعتمد 71.5 مليون جنيه لتطوير البنية التحتية والخدمات

أعلن السيد أحمد إبراهيم، محافظ أسوان، عن اعتماد 71.5 مليون جنيه لتنفيذ حزمة من المشروعات التنموية في المحافظة. وأوضح أن هذه الاعتمادات جاءت بالتنسيق مع الوزارات والجهات المعنية، بهدف تطوير البنية التحتية والخدمات العامة في مختلف مدن ومراكز المحافظة، لتحقيق أقصى استفادة للمواطنين.

وفي بيان له، أعرب المحافظ عن امتنانه للدكتور علي عبد العال، رئيس مجلس النواب، لدعمه المستمر لخطط التنمية في المحافظة وتوجيه الاعتمادات الإضافية لتحويلها إلى مشروعات ملموسة.

## تفاصيل المشروعات المعتمدة

وكشف المهندس إبراهيم سليمان، رئيس مركز ومدينة دراو، عن المشروعات المقرر تنفيذها، والتي تشمل:

- تخصيص 20 مليون جنيه لاستكمال المرحلة الثانية من تغطية ترعة دراو الرئيسية بطول 2 كم، بعد إنجاز المرحلة الأولى بطول 170 متراً. سيؤدي هذا المشروع إلى إنشاء محور مروري جديد بعرض 10 أمتار على طريق أسوان/القاهرة الزراعي، مما يسهم في القضاء على التلوث البيئي وتخفيف الازدحام المروري.

# Meet the World's Largest Free Trade Area

## Introduction and Context
Leaders from around the world, including many in Africa, have been sending congratulatory messages to U.S. President-elect Joe Biden and Vice President-elect Kamala Harris. After four years of a U.S. administration that waged war on multilateral intuitions, African hopes are high for a reset.

## The AfCFTA: A Game-Changing Agreement
In 2018, African heads of state signed an agreement that would bring to life the African Continental Free Trade Area (AfCFTA)—a game-changer in African regional and international trade. When it comes into effect, the AfCFTA will cover a market of more than 1.2 billion people and up to $3 trillion in combined GDP. The United Nations Economic Commission for Africa projects the potential of increasing intra-African trade by over 50 percent, while the World Bank estimates it could add $76 billion in income to the rest of the world.

## Economic Benefits and Implementation
Fundamentally, the AfCFTA will enhance competitiveness and stimulate investment, innovation, and economic growth by:
- Eliminating tariffs on 90 percent of goods
- Incrementally applying the same to services
- Increasing the value of intra-African trade by 15-25 percent by 2040 ($50-70 billion)

Implementation is set to begin in January 2021, focusing first on small and medium-sized enterprises, which account for 90 percent of jobs created on the continent.

## Challenges and Obstacles

### Current Trade Architecture
- Narrow patterns of trade
- Dependence on primary products
- Low levels of inter-country trade
- Dominance by a handful of countries selling limited products

### Infrastructure and Capacity Issues
1. Underdeveloped infrastructure
2. Inadequate power supply
3. Limited processing and packaging capacity
4. Agricultural inefficiencies
   - 50% of labor force in agriculture
   - $72 billion in annual food imports
   - Need for upgraded agro-processing capacity

### COVID-19 Impact
The pandemic has created unprecedented health and economic challenges that threaten to reverse recent development progress.

## The Role of U.S. Leadership

### Existing U.S. Initiatives
- Power Africa
- Prosper Africa
- Millennium Challenge Corporation (MCC)
- U.S. International Development Finance Corporation (DFC)

### Opportunities for the Biden Administration
1. Drive private finance to Africa's single market
2. Strengthen strategic partnership with Africa
3. Utilize existing policy tools and institutions
4. Collaborate with European, Japanese, and Indian partners

## Future Prospects
The AfCFTA presents an opportunity for both Africa and the United States to increase the quality and scope of their economic exchange. Success will require:
1. Coherent U.S. policy toward the continent
2. Investment in infrastructure
3. Support for economic diversification
4. Focus on value-added production

Despite the challenges, African markets continue to present attractive investment opportunities across various sectors, from emerging industries to traditional sectors, benefiting both African and American interests.

El gobierno ucraniano prohibió la homologación de vacunas contra el COVID-19 desarrolladas o producidas en Rusia, según una decisión publicada el miércoles por la noche.

Mientras los políticos prorrusos abogan por el uso de la vacuna Sputnik V en Ucrania, país que aún no cuenta con ningún inmunizante, las autoridades prooccidentales rechazan esta iniciativa. Consideran que Moscú, que respalda la rebelión armada en el este del país, utiliza sus vacunas como instrumento geopolítico.

"La homologación de vacunas contra el COVID-19 desarrolladas o producidas en el país agresor está prohibida", establece la resolución gubernamental, adoptada el lunes y publicada dos días después.

Ucrania declaró oficialmente a Rusia como "país agresor" tras la anexión de la península ucraniana de Crimea en 2014, acontecimiento que desencadenó una guerra con los separatistas prorrusos en el este, quienes, según Kiev, reciben apoyo político y militar del Kremlin.

El 1 de febrero, los separatistas anunciaron el inicio de una campaña de vacunación con Sputnik V en los territorios bajo su control.

For Jonathan, the room was his entire world. It was all he could remember, all he could fathom. The letters on the table had given him his name, and since no one else in the room laid claim to that title, Jonathan saw little use in letting it go to waste.

The room lay in perpetual darkness, save for a single light bulb hanging above a table. On the table sat a fish bowl, and within it, his friend. He called the fish simply 'Fish.' The table offered no other name for his companion.

Jonathan knew Fish would die without water, though he couldn't recall how he possessed this knowledge. He had explored the boundaries of his universe—the walls rough beneath his fingers, cold to the touch. One spot felt particularly frigid, metallic. The walls spoke to him sometimes, promising freedom, though the concept remained foreign to him.

He would ask Fish about it, but as always, his friend maintained his stoic silence.

Though hunger never plagued him, the cold did. When it became unbearable, he would sleep, and with sleep came the recurring dream: a woman named Mary, beautiful yet somehow revolting. He would chase her as she ran, eventually cornering her at the room's edge. Her screams would echo unheard as his fists descended again and again, until silence fell and his hands dripped crimson. The revulsion would transform into crushing sadness, and then he would wake.

Fish's silent presence always helped him weather these dark moments. Despite his reticence, Fish proved an excellent listener.

But today was different. Something stirred in the pit of his stomach—a beast clawing at his insides, demanding tribute.

# The Facial Action Coding System: Revolutionizing Classroom Learning

Recent technological advances have introduced the Facial Action Coding System (FACS), a groundbreaking tool that can identify human emotions. As described in "Making Mona Lisa Smile," this futuristic technology could transform the educational landscape by addressing three critical aspects of learning: comprehension, engagement, and enjoyment.

## Enhancing Student Comprehension

One of the most significant challenges in education is students' reluctance to ask questions when they don't understand the material. Many remain silent due to embarrassment or fear, potentially hampering their educational progress. Teachers, despite their expertise, cannot read minds to identify confusion. The Facial Action Coding System could bridge this gap by automatically detecting signs of confusion, allowing educators to adjust their teaching approach and break down complex concepts more effectively.

## Maintaining Student Engagement

The traditional school day—spanning up to eight hours, five days a week—can naturally lead to periods of disengagement. Students inevitably zone out or become bored during lengthy lessons. By implementing FACS, teachers could receive real-time feedback about student engagement levels, enabling them to adapt their teaching methods and incorporate more dynamic elements into their lessons. This proactive approach could create a more stimulating learning environment for everyone involved.

## Fostering Enjoyment in Learning

Every student has the potential to find academic subjects they genuinely enjoy, though discovering these interests traditionally takes time.

Je vais reformuler et polir ce texte en français pour améliorer sa clarté et sa cohérence :

Parmi les personnages féminins, le site officiel présente les fiches détaillées de cinq d'entre elles, accompagnées d'un aperçu des tenues qu'elles portent selon leur niveau d'études. Le concept du jeu reste inchangé : vous incarnez un jeune garçon (nommé Tenzô dans le jeu d'origine, nom potentiellement modifié dans ce remake) qui, touché par la flèche de Cupidon de l'ange Patako – venue sur Terre pour son examen de fin d'études – devient subitement irrésistible aux yeux des lycéennes.

Le défi pour notre jeune protagoniste ? Il ne dispose que d'une seule journée pour trouver son véritable amour, car après ce délai, le pouvoir disparaîtra, le condamnant à ne plus jamais séduire qui que ce soit. Le gameplay découle naturellement de cette prémisse : vous devez vous défendre, à l'aide de phéromones, contre ces jeunes femmes en émoi qui vous poursuivent. L'objectif est de les étourdir tout en découvrant leur point faible – une zone corporelle particulière qui, une fois stimulée, provoque leur extase. Une fois identifiée, vous utilisez votre "ecstasy shot" pour les neutraliser.

Mais pourquoi cibler ces femmes si vous cherchez l'élue de votre cœur ?
L'utilisation de l'"ecstasy shot" remplit une jauge spéciale qui, une fois pleine, permet d'activer le mode "Doki-Doki". Ce mode vous permet d'interagir plus intimement avec la demoiselle de votre choix, culminant dans un moment de pure félicité après une séquence de câlinage sensoriel expertement menée. Un nouveau mode "Doki-Doki Carnival" est également évoqué.

Dix ans après sa sortie initiale, la réception critique d'un tel titre risque d'être différente, particulièrement dans le contexte actuel de revalorisation de l'image de la femme. Le jeu cible principalement les nostalgiques, séduits par son concept espiègle, qui souhaitent le redécouvrir avec des améliorations techniques modernes et en HD, bien qu'il ne soit pas disponible sur les plateformes PlayStation. Le jeu propose des introductions de personnages retravaillées et plus de 250 illustrations.

Le gameplay reste délibérément répétitif : il faut interagir avec toutes les filles (plus de 70 personnages, chacune disposant de son propre doublage) jusqu'à trois fois pour découvrir tous leurs secrets, dans différentes tenues. Vous devrez éviter leurs lettres d'amour sous peine de dommages, et détruire les mots doux qui apparaissent à l'écran. C'est un concept léger et coquin, à prendre au troisième degré, qui se démarque des traditionnels jeux de zombies. Pour les collectionneurs, un défi supplémentaire consiste à récupérer les 423 culottes dissimulées dans le jeu – preuve supplémentaire qu'il ne s'agit pas d'un titre à prendre au sérieux !

[Section technique sur la sortie et les éditions]
Gal Gun Returns sortira au Japon et en Asie sur Nintendo Switch et Xbox One le 28 janvier 2021, puis sur PC via Steam en février 2021, au prix de 5 800 yens. L'Occident recevra le jeu courant 2021 via l'éditeur PQube. Les versions Xbox One et PC seront exclusivement numériques mondialement, tandis que la version Switch sera disponible en formats physique et numérique (49,99 $).

Une édition limitée Switch sera proposée au Japon à 9 800 yens, comprenant un artbook commémoratif de 100 pages, une bande sonore complète incluant de nouveaux thèmes, le tout dans un coffret collector. Les précommandes incluent un marque-page parfumé à l'effigie de Kaname Nonomiya.

Cette version n'est pas un nouveau jeu mais une remasterisation du Gal Gun original, sorti initialement sur Xbox 360 en janvier 2011 au Japon, puis sur PlayStation 3 en février 2012 avec du contenu supplémentaire et la compatibilité PlayStation Move.

**六月婚礼的传统与意义**
西方人有句谚语：「Marry in June─Good to the man and happy to the maid」（结婚在6月─新郎幸福，新娘快乐），更说6月的新娘会特别漂亮。香港深受西方文化影响，因此愈来愈多人选择于六月举行婚礼。中国人拣选婚期，传统以来喜欢选择年头、年尾，意谓有个好开始或完完满满的意思。西方人却刚刚相反，视6月为结婚的最佳月份，认为6月的婚姻会份外幸福，久而久之在香港6月也成了结婚旺季。

**Chaumet品牌历史与皇室渊源**
法国殿堂级珠宝品牌Chaumet自1780年在巴黎创立开始，就以浪漫的爱情故事为首饰注入生命，同样透过首饰来颂赞永恒不变的爱情。自成立以来，Chaumet的珠宝除了强调精湛的工艺，还有宝石的质素，早就受到皇室贵族所钟爱，成为王室珠宝御用商。当中包括法国第一任国王拿破仑一世，他于18世纪登基之时，就为约瑟芬皇后戴上Chaumet的皇冠为她加冕，从此Chaumet见证著拿破仑和约瑟芬之间的爱情，这亦成了品牌「Crown Your Love」（为爱加冕）婚嫁系列的灵感之源。

**Josephine系列新品介绍**
Chaumet便特别为6月新娘推出全新Josephine Amour d'Aigrette单钻戒指。Chaumet Josephine系列的戒指采用铂金制成，上面铺镶明亮式切割钻石，戒指指环前方呈尖形，有如心形的下半部分，效果独特而富心思，而3款全新钻戒更可以互相组合甚至完美拼叠，就如象征著爱情的不同阶段。

# Finland Approves €8.5M Artillery Ammunition Sale to Estonia

The Finnish government has approved a proposal to supply ammunition for Estonia's 155mm howitzer artillery systems, as confirmed by the Finnish Defence Ministry on Friday. The deal, valued at €8.5 million (excluding taxes), marks another step in strengthening defense cooperation between the two nations.

The formal agreement for the artillery rounds will be finalized through a signing ceremony between both countries' defense ministries in the coming weeks. At the Estonian government's request, specific details regarding ammunition quantity and specifications will remain classified.

The ammunition will be sourced from Finland's existing stockpiles, with the Defense Ministry emphasizing that this transaction won't compromise Finland's own defense capabilities. Finnish defense contractor Nammo Lapua Oy manufactured the majority of the ammunition.

This agreement builds upon ongoing artillery-focused collaboration between the two nations. It follows Estonia's recent decision to acquire South Korean K9 Thunder self-propelled howitzers—the same system Finland chose to procure in early 2017.

# Facial Action Unit Detection and Its Application to Facial Palsy Assessment

## Introduction
Facial action units (AU) detection has gained significant attention in computer vision due to its diverse applications, including mental disease diagnosis, face recognition, e-learning experience enhancement, and deception detection. A particularly important application is the assessment of facial palsy, a condition affecting approximately 23 per 100,000 people annually. Facial palsy causes temporary or permanent weakness or paralysis on one side of the face, typically developing within 72 hours of onset.

The severity of facial paralysis can be evaluated through the collective manifestations of facial muscle areas, similar to how individual expressions are represented using the Facial Action Coding System (FACS). Current methods for assessing facial palsy severity remain largely subjective, and there is limited research extending AU detection models to facial paralysis assessment.

## Background and Challenges
From a biological perspective, AU activation corresponds to facial muscle movements. However, AU detection presents challenges due to subtle facial changes. Early works relied on hand-crafted features to represent local facial regions, but these features proved insufficiently discriminative due to their shallow nature. This limitation led to the development of deep learning-based approaches for AU detection.

## Existing Approaches and Their Limitations
Recent AU detection methods typically combine local features from multiple independent AU branches. Two main approaches have emerged:

1. Grid-based methods:
   - Divide faces into equal grids
   - Use CNN features from each grid
   - Limitations:
     - Difficulty in accurately focusing on muscle regions
     - Inadequate representation of irregularly shaped AU patches

2. Multi-branch combination methods:
   - Refine AU-related features using irregular regions
   - Fuse global or local features from independent branches
   - Limitations:
     - Ignore interrelationships between multiple AU areas
     - Limited ability to establish adaptive AU regions
     - Insufficient modeling of local and global context

## Proposed Solution: ALGRNet
To address these limitations, we propose ALGRNet, featuring:

1. Skip-BiLSTM Module:
   - Improves local AU representations
   - Models mutual assistance and exclusion relationships
   - Uses learned adaptive landmarks

2. Feature Fusion & Refining Module:
   - Filters information contributing to target AU
   - Incorporates non-AU areas
   - Generates more discriminative local AU features

The system considers biological phenomena such as:
- Correlated AU patches in specific expressions (e.g., Duchenne smile)
- Muscle linkage effects (e.g., simultaneous activation of AU2 and AU7)
- Individual variations in muscle activation areas

## Key Contributions
1. Development of skip-BiLSTM module for robust local AU representations
2. Implementation of feature fusion & refining module for discriminative feature generation
3. Application to facial palsy estimation, demonstrating system robustness and transferability

南亚岛国斯里兰卡新冠肺炎疫情持续严峻，上周五单日死亡人数创下198人的新高，目前该国累计死亡人数已达7,560人。面对如此庞大的死亡人数，传统棺材供不应求，许多家庭转而选择使用纸板棺材为逝者入殓并火化。斯里兰卡政府也积极推广这种新方案，不仅成本低廉，而且更加环保。

据路透社报道，在斯里兰卡最大城市科伦坡以南的代希瓦勒-芒特拉维尼港（Dehiwala-Mount Lavinia），一家"纸棺材工厂"的工人们正在用订书钉和胶水组装纸板棺材，主要供新冠肺炎逝者使用。

当地政府官员普里扬莎·萨哈班杜（Priyantha Sahabandu）表示，纸棺材具有诸多优势：采用再生纸制成，价格仅为传统木棺的六分之一。

萨哈班杜解释道："目前斯里兰卡平均每天约有400人死亡，其中主要死因是新冠肺炎。若要制作400个传统棺材，每天需要砍伐250至300棵树龄超过15年的大树，这对环境造成巨大破坏。因此，我们卫生委员会开始推广使用环保纸板棺材。"

"这一举措很快得到民众响应。在疫情影响下，许多人生计困难，昂贵的木棺确实不切实际。"

据介绍，每具纸棺材售价约4,500斯里兰卡卢比（约合新台币640元），而最便宜的木质棺材也要3万卢比（约合新台币4,200元）。

# Rappel massif de produits de porc aux États-Unis : Alerte à la Listeria

Le Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) du département américain de l'Agriculture vient d'annoncer un important rappel de produits de porc, totalisant près de 235 000 livres. Cette décision, prise le 5 décembre, fait suite à une possible contamination par Listeria monocytogenes.

## Produits concernés

Les articles rappelés, fabriqués par Alexander & Hornung (une filiale de Perdue Premium Meat Company), comprennent notamment :
- Jambons entièrement cuits
- Produits au pepperoni
- Jambon fumé Wellshire Wood
- Jambon tranché du club alimentaire
- Produits Garett Valley Farms
- Produits Buther Boy
- Pepperoni Five Star
- Steak de jambon fumé au caryer avec os Big Y

## Comment identifier les produits concernés ?

Les produits rappelés présentent les caractéristiques suivantes :
- Dates de péremption : entre le 15/12/2021 et le 04/05/2022
- Étiquette portant la mention "EST. M10125" dans le logo USDA
- Disponibles dans les commerces de détail à travers les États-Unis

## Recommandations sanitaires

Bien qu'aucun effet indésirable n'ait été signalé à ce jour, il est conseillé de :
1. Vérifier vos réfrigérateurs et congélateurs
2. Jeter immédiatement tout produit concerné
3. Consulter un professionnel de santé en cas de consommation, particulièrement pour les personnes à risque

### Symptômes de la listériose

La listériose peut se manifester par :
- Fièvre
- Douleurs musculaires
- Maux de tête
- Raideur de la nuque
- Confusion
- Perte d'équilibre
- Convulsions
- Symptômes gastro-intestinaux

Les personnes à risque élevé incluent :
- Les femmes enceintes
- Les personnes immunodéprimées
- Les personnes âgées

Pour toute question :
- Site web : www.alexanderhornung.com
- Contact : Kerri McClimen, VP Communications
  - Téléphone : (773) 746-7077
  - Email : kerrim@alexander-hornung.com

# Opération antiterroriste : six arrestations à Paris et Bordeaux

Une importante opération antiterroriste s'est déroulée ce lundi et mardi, menée par la sous-direction antiterroriste (SDAT) de la police judiciaire en région bordelaise et à Paris.

Au total, six personnes ont été interpellées, selon une information de BFMTV confirmée par une source proche du dossier à franceinfo. Les suspects, quatre hommes et deux femmes âgés de 27 à 48 ans, sont soupçonnés d'avoir organisé, contre rémunération, des départs vers la zone irako-syrienne.

Cinq des interpellations ont eu lieu en région bordelaise, tandis que la sixième suspecte a été arrêtée dans Paris intra-muros. Parmi les suspects masculins, tous étaient déjà connus des services pour des faits de radicalisation. Un détail particulièrement notable : l'un d'entre eux avait précédemment été incarcéré à Guantanamo, pour des motifs non précisés par la source contactée par franceinfo.

**The Drawbacks of Facial Expression Recognition Technology in Education**

New software has emerged that analyzes students' facial expressions to determine their emotions, including happiness, sadness, and boredom. While this technology is being considered for classroom implementation to optimize learning based on emotional feedback, its use may actually be detrimental to the educational experience.

The primary concern is privacy and surveillance. As noted in the text, "Using imagery, the new emotion-recognition software tracks these facial movements" (D'Alto 4). This continuous monitoring raises significant privacy concerns, as students would be under constant camera surveillance. Furthermore, such systems could be vulnerable to security breaches, potentially exposing students to unauthorized observation or data theft.

Cost presents another substantial barrier. The text emphasizes that "Your home PC can't handle the complex algorithms used to decode Mona Lisa's smile" (D'Alto 7). This limitation necessitates specialized equipment, creating a significant financial burden for schools. If institutions cannot bear these costs, the expense might be passed on to families, potentially exacerbating educational inequities.

Perhaps most importantly, the technology's fundamental premise may be flawed. As Dr. Huang suggests, "A classroom computer could recognize when a student is becoming confused or bored... Then it could modify the lesson, like an effective human instructor" (D'Alto 6). However, facial expressions don't always accurately reflect a student's engagement with the material. A student's confused expression might stem from a private conversation rather than the lesson content, yet the system would unnecessarily adjust the curriculum in response.

The development of students' communication skills is also at stake. Learning to articulate understanding or confusion to teachers is a crucial part of education.

# 新版TPP：澳日承诺3月前完成签署

*2018年1月19日 02:29 中央社 东京18日综合外电报导*

澳大利亚总理特恩布尔（Malcolm Turnbull）今日宣布，澳大利亚与日本已决心与其他支持国家共同推进新版跨太平洋伙伴关系协定（TPP），目标在3月前完成签署。

据路透社报导，特恩布尔在东京发表演说时表示："我与日本首相安倍晋三将致力确保这项协定在3月前完成签署。"

自美国总统特朗普去年初以保护国内就业为由宣布退出TPP后，其余11个成员国并未放弃。他们在2017年11月越南举行的亚太经济合作会议（APEC）期间继续推进谈判。

虽然包括日本、澳大利亚和加拿大在内的11国部长已就在美国缺席情况下继续推进TPP核心要素达成共识，但加拿大等国要求确保协定能够保障就业机会的诉求仍是主要障碍。

特恩布尔强调："我们热切期望这11个国家能成为首批成员，但当务之急是与已准备就绪的国家共同推动新版TPP尽快生效。"

Venus, often called the Evening Star, is one of the brightest points of light in the night sky. 

As the second planet from our Sun, Venus bears the closest resemblance to Earth in terms of density and size.

No spacecraft has survived Venus's surface for more than a few hours, which explains why no mission has attempted a landing there in over three decades. The planet's surface presents extreme challenges: temperatures average over 800 degrees, and the atmospheric pressure is 90 times greater than Earth's. Remarkably, Venus maintains the hottest surface temperature of any planet in our solar system, surpassing even Mercury despite being farther from the Sun.

Scientists believe that Venus was once largely covered by oceans and may have supported various forms of life, much like Earth.

NASA has proposed an intriguing concept for human exploration of Venus. Despite the risks, scientists determined to conduct comprehensive studies of Venus must find ways to observe the planet up close.

# قضية تزوير عقد هبة تورط زوجين مسنين

## مقدمة القضية
تورط زوجان مسنان في العقد الثامن من العمر في قضية جنائية تتعلق بتزوير عقد هبة لفيلا. وقد حرر العقد موثق من منطقة باب الوادي في أواخر التسعينيات، في غياب المالك الأصلي الذي كان متواجداً في دار للشيخوخة بفرنسا.

## تفاصيل القضية
- في 12 جويلية 1997، قام العجوز "عامر.م" بتحرير عقد هبة لصالحه ولزوجته عند موثق يدعى "رابح،ب" في باب الوادي.
- كان شقيق المتهم "م، محمد" (الواهب) مقيماً في دار للشيخوخة بفرنسا بعد وفاة زوجته الفرنسية بسبع سنوات.
- في 18 جويلية، وصل الشقيق الأكبر إلى الجزائر العاصمة، وفي اليوم التالي توجه مع المتهم وزوجته وأبنائهم إلى الموثق للتوقيع على العقد بحضور شاهدين.

## اكتشاف التزوير
- بعد خمس سنوات، نشب خلاف بين "م، عبد الكريم" والزوجين المسنين بسبب محاولة طرده من الطابق الأول للفيلا.
- عند رفع دعوى استعجالية، تبين أن العقد مزور بسبب التباين في التواريخ:
  - توقيع المتهم: 12 جويلية
  - توقيع الواهب: 19 جويلية
  - توثيق العقد: في التاريخ الأول حين لم يكن الواهب حاضراً

## المحاكمة والتهم
- الزوجان المسنان: متهمان باستعمال محرر عمومي مزور
- الموثق "رابح": متهم بالتزوير في محررات عمومية
- الشاهدان: متهمان بالإقرار الكاذب

## نتائج المحاكمة
- اعترف العجوز المتهم بتوقيع العقد قبل حضور شقيقه بطلب من الموثق، مؤكداً جهله بالقراءة والكتابة
- لم تجب الزوجة على أسئلة المحكمة بسبب كبر سنها
- طلبت النيابة العامة:
  - 3 سنوات حبس نافذ للزوجين المتهمين
  - سنة حبس نافذ لباقي المتهمين

The development of driverless cars represents a crucial advancement in automotive technology that could revolutionize road safety and accessibility. Every year, countless lives are lost due to preventable accidents caused by distracted driving, particularly from texting, and impaired driving due to alcohol consumption. Autonomous vehicles offer a promising solution to these pressing issues.

These vehicles would be programmed to strictly adhere to traffic laws, maintaining proper speed limits and observing all traffic signals and signs. This systematic compliance would significantly reduce the risk of accidents caused by human error or negligence. Moreover, the constant alertness of autonomous systems would eliminate accidents caused by driver fatigue or inattention, which are major contributors to road fatalities.

Beyond safety improvements, driverless cars would provide unprecedented mobility opportunities for individuals who currently face transportation challenges. People with visual impairments, physical disabilities, or other conditions that prevent them from operating traditional vehicles would gain newfound independence. This technology could open up new possibilities for transportation equity, ensuring that everyone has access to safe and reliable transportation.

The benefits of autonomous vehicles extend beyond individual users to society as a whole. By reducing accidents caused by human error and providing reliable transportation options for all members of society, driverless cars represent a significant step forward in both public safety and accessibility.

# Innovations technologiques québécoises : quatre entreprises qui font la différence

Qu'elles soient petites ou moyennes, les entreprises du Québec y vont d'innovations technologiques qui passent parfois sous le radar. En voici quatre susceptibles d'améliorer leur champ d'activité.

*Par Martin Primeau, Collaboration spéciale*

## 1. Effenco : La révolution du moteur hybride

Dans le sud-ouest de Montréal, Effenco s'est donné pour mission de convertir les moteurs à essence des véhicules lourds en moteurs hybrides. L'entreprise a développé une technologie novatrice baptisée « Active-Stop-Start » qui permet de couper le moteur d'un véhicule à l'arrêt tout en maintenant ses équipements électriques fonctionnels grâce à une batterie. 

Sur les camions à ordures, le système permet notamment d'opérer le lève-bec et le chauffage. La technologie, développée par Benoît Lacroix et ses deux partenaires, permet de réduire de 40 à 60 % le gaspillage d'essence des camions lourds. L'entreprise a décroché un contrat majeur pour équiper 1100 camions à ordures de la Ville de New York, ainsi qu'un contrat pour 57 camions de l'opérateur portuaire Termont Montréal.

## 2. Sollum Technologies : Le soleil artificiel

Sollum Technologies a développé un système d'éclairage artificiel révolutionnaire qui reproduit la lumière naturelle du soleil tout au long de la journée. Cette innovation s'inspire du processus d'évolution des plantes, qui ont mis des millions d'années à optimiser leur captation de l'énergie solaire.

La technologie repose sur des algorithmes sophistiqués qui modulent l'intensité des diodes électroluminescentes (DEL), offrant aux serres une alternative aux éclairages à spectre fixe. L'entreprise est en voie de finaliser un financement de plus de 2,5 millions de dollars pour développer des projets plus ambitieux en 2020.

## 3. Silicycle : Innovation pharmaceutique

Basée à Québec, Silicycle innove dans le domaine pharmaceutique avec sa cartouche SiliaMetS E-PAK, qui optimise l'extraction des métaux utilisés dans la fabrication des médicaments. Avec des ventes préliminaires d'un million de dollars, son président Hugo St-Laurent anticipe des revenus de plusieurs dizaines de millions dans les mois à venir.

L'entreprise, fondée en 1995, s'était déjà démarquée avec une première innovation : une méthode de nettoyage des gels de silicium utilisés pour la séparation et la purification des molécules dans l'industrie pharmaceutique.

## 4. Varitron : L'avenir de l'électronique

Varitron se distingue par sa technologie d'impression de composantes électroniques sur substrats flexibles, comparable à l'impression à jet d'encre. Cette innovation permettra notamment la fabrication d'antennes cellulaires pour la 5G. 

En mai dernier, l'entreprise a inauguré le premier centre canadien dédié à l'assemblage de cartes électroniques et à l'électronique imprimée au C2MI de Bromont. Ce centre permettra également d'exploiter sa technologie novatrice de refroidissement des composantes électroniques par immersion dans un liquide non conducteur d'électricité.

# Une Solution Créative pour un Dilemme Environnemental

## Le Contexte et le Défi
Comment respecter une loi polluante quand on veut préserver l'environnement ? Cette question a poussé Ludovic Gerboin, un boulanger originaire de Mayenne, à trouver une solution innovante. Installé en Allemagne depuis vingt ans, il fait face à une nouvelle réglementation : depuis le 1er janvier, tous les commerçants du pays sont obligés d'établir un ticket de caisse pour chaque client, quel que soit le montant. Cette mesure, destinée à lutter contre la fraude, pose un problème environnemental évident.

## Une Solution Innovante
Face à ce dilemme, Ludovic Gerboin a eu une idée originale : créer "le seul ticket de caisse bon pour l'environnement" - un ticket comestible intégré au glaçage de ses beignets. Cette approche créative permet de respecter la loi tout en évitant le gaspillage de papier.

## Un Succès Viral
L'initiative a rapidement gagné en popularité après qu'une cliente a partagé l'idée sur les réseaux sociaux.

# 1. Introduction

## 1.1 Background and Motivation
Watershed models are crucial tools for estimating streamflow and understanding water exchanges in the terrestrial water cycle. These systems face increasing challenges from anthropogenic activities (e.g., agricultural intensification) and climate perturbations (e.g., wildfire, rain-on-snow, rising temperatures). Understanding and modeling these systems is essential for sustainable water resource management.

## 1.2 Current Modeling Approaches
Several open-source watershed modeling tools exist, including:
- SWAT and its variants
- Advanced Terrestrial Simulator (ATS)
- Precipitation Runoff Modeling System (PRMS)
- Weather Research and Forecasting Model (WRF-Hydro)
- Other tools (RHESSys, VIC, MIKE-SHE, DHSVM, HSPF)

## 1.3 Model Parameters and Calibration Challenges
Watershed models utilize two types of parameters:
1. Physical parameters (e.g., permeability, porosity) - measurable from observational data
2. Conceptual/empirical parameters - difficult or impossible to measure directly

Most current models rely heavily on conceptual parameters, requiring extensive calibration using observational data. This presents challenges for ungauged watersheds.

## 1.4 Existing Calibration Methods and Limitations
Current calibration techniques include:
- Generalized likelihood uncertainty estimation (GLUE)
- Maximum likelihood estimation
- Shuffled complex evolution method (SCE-UA)
- Bayesian parameter estimation methods
- Ensemble-based data assimilation methods
- Adjoint-based methods

These methods face several limitations:
- Time-consuming execution
- Need for good initial guesses
- High computational requirements
- Reduced accuracy with high-dimensional parameters
- Difficulty handling nonlinear relationships

## 1.5 Deep Learning as a Solution
Deep learning shows promise in addressing these limitations through:
- Efficient handling of nonlinear relationships
- Robust performance with observational errors
- Lower computational costs after training
- Effective feature extraction through multiple neural layers

### Advantages of CNNs
Convolutional Neural Networks offer specific benefits:
- Better local pattern recognition in time-series data
- Lower data requirements compared to dense neural networks

Le Lycée Jean Hinglo a inauguré sa première classe "Défense et Sécurité Globale" suite à la signature d'une convention entre les Forces Armées dans la Zone Sud de l'Océan Indien (FAZSOI), l'Académie de La Réunion et l'Institut des Hautes Études de Défense Nationale, le mercredi 4 novembre 2020. Nous publions ci-dessous le communiqué intégral de la FAZSOI.

Le mercredi 4 novembre 2020, la première classe "Défense et Sécurité Globale" du lycée Jean Hinglo a été officiellement lancée. La création de ces classes est rendue possible grâce au trinôme académique, composé des Forces Armées dans la Zone Sud de l'Océan Indien (FAZSOI), de l'Académie de La Réunion et de l'Institut des Hautes Études de Défense Nationale de l'Océan Indien (IHEDN).

Le programme de ces classes prévoit de dispenser aux lycéens de seconde deux heures d'enseignement hebdomadaire portant sur des thèmes civiques, historiques et militaires. Cette année, 16 élèves du lycée Jean Hinglo participeront à un Rallye citoyen, visiteront la base navale de Port-des-Galets, assisteront à une présentation des métiers de la défense et bénéficieront d'une sensibilisation au Service National Universel (SNU).

La convention a été signée par les autorités du trinôme académique : le général Yves Metayer, commandant supérieur des FAZSOI, Madame Chantal Manès-Bonnisseau, rectrice de l'Académie de La Réunion, et Monsieur Bernard Hay, président de l'association régionale de l'IHEDN. Le capitaine de vaisseau Arnaud Paquet, commandant de la base navale du Port-des-Galets, et Monsieur Jean-Marc Spampani, proviseur du lycée, ont également apposé leur signature sur cette convention, qui officialise plus particulièrement la collaboration entre la Marine Nationale et ce lycée du Port.

# Linear Contextual Bandits: Framework and Challenges

## Introduction to Stochastic Contextual Bandits

The stochastic contextual bandit provides a framework for sequential decision-making problems. In this setting:
- A learner observes a context from a fixed distribution at each step
- The learner selects an action
- The learner receives a noisy reward

The primary goal is to maximize accumulated rewards over n rounds, measured by regret compared to optimal actions. This framework has found widespread applications in:
- Recommendation systems
- Online advertising  
- Clinical trials

## Linear Contextual Bandits: Core Concepts

Linear contextual bandit is a prominent instance of this framework, valued for its:
- Computational efficiency
- Strong theoretical guarantees

In this setting:
- The reward for each context x and action a is represented as a linear combination between:
  - d-dimensional features φ(x, a) ∈ Rd
  - An unknown parameter θ ∈ Rd
- φ is referred to as a realizable representation

## Algorithmic Approaches and Performance Bounds

Algorithms based on the optimism-in-the-face-of-uncertainty principle (e.g., LinUCB and OFUL) achieve:
- Minimax regret bound: O(Sd√n ln(nL))
- Problem-dependent regret: O(S²d²/Δ ln²(nL))

Where:
- Δ: minimum gap between best and second-best action rewards across contexts
- L and S: upper bounds to the ℓ₂-norm of φ and θ respectively

## Challenges and Limitations

The representation's impact on performance extends beyond just dimension d and norm bounds L and S:
- Different realizable representations with identical parameters d and S can yield significantly different performance
- Some "good" representations enable LinUCB to achieve constant regret (not scaling with horizon n)

Recent research has:
- Identified conditions for achieving constant regret with LinUCB
- Demonstrated sub-linear regret for greedy algorithms
- Established regret guarantees for model selection between linear and multi-arm representations

## Technical Details of LinUCB Implementation

LinUCB's operation involves:
1. Building parameter estimates through ridge regression
2. Constructing confidence ellipsoids
3. Selecting actions based on upper-confidence bounds

The algorithm achieves regret bounds of:
- O(Sφdφ√n ln(nLφ/δ)) with probability ≥ 1-δ
- O(S²φd²φ/Δ ln²(nLφ/δ)) when minimum gap Δ > 0 exists

This restructuring presents the material in a more logical progression, moving from general concepts to specific implementations while maintaining clear thematic sections.

Though sorting through them all would have taken an eternity, the figure thumbing through one stack knew precisely where each secret resided.

# La Chute d'un Leader de l'Opposition au Tchad

## L'Arrestation et ses Implications
Après l'interpellation brutale ce jeudi de l'opposant politique Médard Laokein Kurayo, on assiste sans doute à la chute d'un représentant emblématique de l'opposition tchadienne. Cette arrestation marque un tournant décisif pour celui qui, jusqu'alors, était considéré comme une figure incontournable dans sa région natale de Moundou.

## Un Parcours Politique Notable
Élu maire de Moundou, la capitale économique, depuis 2012, Médard Laokein Kourayo jouissait d'une grande popularité auprès de sa population. Son parti, la Convention Tchadienne pour le Développement et la Paix (CTDP), dominait régulièrement les élections locales. Sa stature politique était telle qu'il avait même décliné le poste de Premier ministre après être arrivé troisième lors de la dernière présidentielle.

## Les Accusations
Les autorités reprochent à l'ancien maire le détournement de fonds de la mairie de Moundou, dont il a été destitué le 28 juin dernier. Selon Evariste Ngarlem Toldé, analyste politique et chercheur à l'université de N'Djamena, cette accusation pourrait sérieusement ternir son image :

> "On ne dirait pas mieux que de parler de sa chute. On ne pouvait pas s'attendre à un tel événement. Mais on savait qu'on lui mettait les bâtons dans les roues pour qu'on arrive à sa chute."

## Conditions de Détention Controversées
Après son arrestation, Laokein Kourayo a été immédiatement transféré au commissariat de police de Moundou. Son avocat, Me Boniface Mouandilmadji, dénonce des violations flagrantes des droits de la défense :

> "On m'a chassé comme un malpropre du commissariat central, ils m'ont dit qu'ils se moquaient de l'avocat. Sa femme était allée hier soir pour lui donner de l'eau et des médicaments. Les policiers ont pris la bouteille d'eau, mais ont refusé les médicaments. C'est ce matin qu'il est sorti du violon pour rester à l'air libre sous un arbre."

## Réaction de l'Opposition
Le FONAC (plateforme des partis de l'opposition) condamne fermement cette arrestation.
